event.title: On the contrary
event.description:
Summer time and ice cream is on your way, are you ready? Look at the ice drinks plus ice cream cake, this hot temperature is absolutely no that intolerable. Thus, this demand for cake display chillers grows to meet summer, no matter to the common cake freshness or to the summer’s goods. What could be the most suitable temperature intended for cake display cabinet?



It is a list of content：

Operating Principle Of Cake Display Fridge

Features Of Food Display Fridge

Matters Desiring Attention Of Cake Display Fridge



Working Principle Associated with Cake Display Fridge
The very best system for cakes is actually fan cooling. Fan cooling is a variety of cooling in which air is employed as a medium to cool objects that has to be cooled. The automatic defrosting humidity while in the freezer is low, the refrigeration is even to achieve the effect of precise temperature control, and the food will not freeze collectively, greatly reducing the smell of each one other.



It works commonly by increasing the surface of the object this needs cooling, or by increasing the interest rate at which air flows with the object per unit of time, or both.

The former might be achieved by adding a radiator for the surface of an item, usually hanging the radiator outside the house the object, or fixed around the object to make the heat dissipation more efficient.



The latter can utilize fan will strengthen ventilated, aggrandizement chilling effect. In most instances, the cooling efficiency is usually greatly improved by putting fins. Obviously, our products will be the latter one.



Features Of Cake Display Fridge
Hold cooling temperature uniform

Our bodies of cake display show off is fan cooling program, the most suitable method for cake storage, creating cakes fresh and smelling beneficial.

Good insulation layer to save energy

The better the grade of insulation is, the more energy saves. The high density foaming makes perfect insulation effect.

What’s far more, the layer is also CFC free. CFC zero cost means we don’t work with materials having chlorofluorocarbon, more healthy for human, friendlier pertaining to environment. But it won’t injure the insulation effect regarding foaming layer. On the contrary, our insulation works better.

Front double tempered cup with heater

Front double tempered glass with heater provides cake inside a proper temperature to settle nice.

Back sliding goblet door

Have you ever been upset for the reason that sliding glass door appeared to be too tight to wide open? Then take a evaluate our cake display emphasize! Our back sliding glass doors can simply open with excellent insulation effect.



Matters Needing Particular attention Of Cake Display Chiller
according to the selection, every kinds of cake has a optimal refrigerated temperature. As a way to ensure the taste regarding cakes, most businesses refrigerate the cakes inside the cake display cabinet. So the right way to adjust and control the temperature in the cake display cabinet? Easy methods to use the cake present cabinet correctly?

The correct technique of regulating the cake display cabinet temperature brings great help to it’s cooling effect.

Because of the change of the alternative environment temperature affects its internal temperature, such as hot along with cold environment and the amount of cake display cabinet doorways and frost can impact its temperature.

Therefore, there will be a temperature difference of several degrees between the internal temperature from the cake display cabinet as well as debugging temperature, which is usually a normal phenomenon. There is no issue with the cake display cabinet.

There are two main reasons the reason for the temperature of food display showcase:

Seasons

Summertime

The high ambient temperature in summer causes it to be difficult to reduce the temperature from the cabinet. The proper certifications is 2 to SEVEN degrees

Therefore, the startup time inside cabinet will increase, insurance policy coverage shutdown time will possibly be reduced, which not only makes the compressor work under high temperature for some time and causes damage, and increases the power intake.

Winter

In winter, that ambient temperature is rather low.

If it is close to the regulated temperature, the startup and shutdown time will be more balanced, which not just saves energy, but has the benefit of no significant impact for the external temperature. Cake display cabinet refrigeration temperature ought to be between 0 to 10 degrees to normalcy operation.

Species

Cold backup

The temperature is A SINGLE to 4 degrees, preferably near to 2 degrees.

Such seeing that mousse, jelly, framed birthday or framed cake and cream decoration cake belong to here.

Frozen storage

Your temperature is -18 levels.

Ice cream cakes, as an example, are displayed in all these cake display showcase.



The correct temperature of cake display fridge is according to the species and seasons into a large extent. If you want to purchase one your private cake display cabinet or only more information and coaching, welcome to visit your website!
